View Javadoc
1   package com.test.vendor.sqlite;
2   
3   import com.jsql.model.accessible.DataAccess;
4   import com.test.AbstractTestSuite;
5   import org.apache.commons.lang3.StringUtils;
6   
7   import java.util.ArrayList;
8   import java.util.Collection;
9   import java.util.List;
10  import java.util.regex.Matcher;
11  import java.util.regex.Pattern;
12  
13  public abstract class ConcreteSqliteSuiteIT extends AbstractTestSuite {
14  
15      public ConcreteSqliteSuiteIT() {
16          this.config();
17      }
18      
19      public void config() {
20          
21          // TODO Use same hibernate properties
22          this.jdbcURL = "jdbc:sqlite:jsql-sqlite-its.db";
23          this.jdbcUser = StringUtils.EMPTY;
24          this.jdbcPass = StringUtils.EMPTY;
25          this.jsqlDatabaseName = "musicstore";
26          this.jsqlTableName = "Student";
27          this.jsqlColumnName = "Student_Id";
28          
29          this.jdbcColumnForDatabaseName = "sqlite_master";
30          this.jdbcColumnForTableName = "name";
31          this.jdbcColumnForColumnName = "sql";
32          
33          this.jdbcQueryForDatabaseNames = "select '"+ this.jdbcColumnForDatabaseName +"' "+ this.jdbcColumnForDatabaseName +" from "+ this.jdbcColumnForDatabaseName +" WHERE type = 'table'";
34          this.jdbcQueryForTableNames =    "select "+ this.jdbcColumnForTableName +" from sqlite_master WHERE type = 'table'";
35          this.jdbcQueryForColumnNames =   "select "+ this.jdbcColumnForColumnName +" from "+ this.jdbcColumnForDatabaseName +" where tbl_name = '"+ this.jsqlTableName +"' and type = 'table'";
36          this.jdbcQueryForValues =    "select "+ this.jsqlColumnName +" from "+ this.jsqlTableName;
37      }
38      
39      @Override
40      protected Collection<String> parse(List<String> rawColumns) {
41          
42          String modelColumns = rawColumns.stream().findFirst().orElseThrow(IllegalArgumentException::new);
43          String columnsToParse = this.injectionModel.getMediatorVendor().getSqlite().transformSqlite(modelColumns);
44          
45          Matcher regexSearch =
46              Pattern
47              .compile(
48                  DataAccess.MODE
49                  + DataAccess.ENCLOSE_VALUE_RGX
50                  + DataAccess.CELL_TABLE
51                  + DataAccess.ENCLOSE_VALUE_RGX
52              )
53              .matcher(columnsToParse);
54  
55          List<String> columns = new ArrayList<>();
56          
57          while (regexSearch.find()) {
58              
59              columns.add(regexSearch.group(1));
60          }
61          
62          return columns;
63      }
64  }
